name: Duffel
headline: The complete toolkit to sell travel.
description: Any business - from travel startups to financial enterprises - can build with Duffel. Shop flights and accommodation, purchase extras, manage bookings and more.

raw_markdown='[Duffel Lockup](https://duffel.com/<https:/duffel.com>)Product chevron_down iconUse cases chevron_down iconResources chevron_down icon[Pricing](https://duffel.com/</pricing>)Company chevron_down icon
[Log in](https://duffel.com/<https:/app.duffel.com/sign-in>)[Sign up](https://duffel.com/<https:/app.duffel.com/join>)menu icon
# Sell travel, without the complexity.
Any business - from startups to large enterprises - can sell travel with Duffel. Shop, book, and manage flights, stays, and travel extras 
[Start now→](https://duffel.com/<https:/app.duffel.com/join>)
[Contact us](https://duffel.com/</contact-us>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/3440x1096/5340e3c810/hero.webp)
## Trusted by teams at
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/x/fb02fee522/travelbank-logo-rgb-color-1.svg)![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/107x32/4673c5b81e/alternative-airlines.svg)![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/x/2b061bdfaf/ascenda-logo.svg)![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/91x32/04f9d1a173/ulysse.svg)![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/130x29/5c1f2065ac/atlaslogo.svg)![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/303x166/c14429b022/hotelengine.png)
Use cases
## Start selling travel today 
[![Visualisation of search filters in Duffel Links.](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/1480x771/716490e1ab/banks.webp)Duffel for Challenger Banks →Leverage thousands of hours of expertise in travel and product design. Your customers can search for their preferred flight instantly using autocomplete functionality, search filters and more.](https://duffel.com/</challenger-banks>)[![Visualisation of search filters in Duffel Links.](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/1481x770/3cf5dedd4c/spend-management.webp)Duffel for Spend Management →Capture and control employee spend from within your platform by selling flights inside your spend management solution.](https://duffel.com/</spend-management>)
Product suite
## Create the best travel experience for your customers
[![Flight search UI mock-up](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/828x552/d7b6ddc782/search.webp)](https://duffel.com/</flights>)
![Duffel Flights API logo](https://assets.duffel.com/img/hq-assets/product-logos/flights-api.svg)
Flights
Build an intuitive flight search, offer loyalty programme perks, add seats and bags, manage your orders, and more.
[Learn more→](https://duffel.com/</flights>)
[Search![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/828x552/d7b6ddc782/search.webp)](https://duffel.com/</flights>)[Book![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/852x552/cb584926ad/book.webp)](https://duffel.com/</flights>)[Ancillaries![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/840x556/4e2e3184d7/ancillaries.webp)](https://duffel.com/</flights>)[Order management![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/840x555/c528e0ce17/order-management.webp)](https://duffel.com/</flights>)
Managed content
[Access content from global airlines using our accreditation and ticketing authority →](https://duffel.com/</flights/content/managed>)
[![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/828x549/9f0370d263/earn-commission.webp)](https://duffel.com/</stays>)
![Duffel Stays logo](https://assets.duffel.com/img/hq-assets/product-logos/stays.svg)
Stays
Earn commission on over 1 million properties globally. Build an intuitive hotel shopping experience, giving your customer the information they need and access to their loyalty benefits.
[Learn more→](https://duffel.com/</stays>)
[Earn commission![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/828x549/9f0370d263/earn-commission.webp)](https://duffel.com/</stays>)[Global inventory![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/852x552/11c7bfe54a/global-inventory.webp)](https://duffel.com/</stays>)[Loyalty![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/840x551/ed18c1615f/loyalty.webp)](https://duffel.com/</stays>)[Rich content![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/840x552/e190eb16e2/rich-content.webp)](https://duffel.com/</stays>)
[![Links UI mock-up](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/684x552/b1a141e3f9/customisable.webp)](https://duffel.com/</links>)
![Duffel Links logo](https://assets.duffel.com/img/hq-assets/product-logos/links.svg)
Links
A ready-made, customisable flight-shopping experience available to offer to your customers from day one.
[Learn more→](https://duffel.com/</links>)
[Customizable![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/684x552/b1a141e3f9/customisable.webp)](https://duffel.com/</links>)[Add ancillaries![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/684x552/752609a6d4/add-ancillaries.webp)](https://duffel.com/</links>)
easy-to-use api
## Build with zero limitations
Comprehensive docs, user guides, client libraries in Node.js, Python and Ruby, and prebuilt components like seat selection and payments. We designed a great user experience to make it easier for you to do the same.
[Explore documentation→](https://duffel.com/</docs>)
Node.jsCLI
```

import{Duffel}from'@duffel/api'
const duffel =newDuffel({
token:YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN
})
duffel.offerRequests.create({
slices:[
{
origin:"SFO",
destination:"LON",
departure_date:"2023-06-26"
}
],
passengers:[{type:"adult"}],
cabin_class: "business

```

[JavaScript Client Library→](https://duffel.com/</docs/guides/javascript-client-library>)
[NEWBuild baggage and seat selection (and more) in a flash with our new ancillaries componentarrow_forward icon](https://duffel.com/</docs/guides/ancillaries-component>)
Customer spotlight
## Become a success story
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/x/393d5f3c39/logos-customer-pelikin.svg)
Pelikin is one example of how a non-traditional travel seller can easily enter the market and set up a new revenue stream within their business model, with the ability to integrate quickly, access multiple airlines, and leverage industry accreditation.
[See how they do it→](https://duffel.com/</blog/pelikin-partners-with-duffel>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/91x32/04f9d1a173/ulysse.svg)
Ulysse sees technology as a vital part of the customer experience as well as a resource that sets them apart from their competition. Using Duffel’s APIs, Ulysse is able to invest in the strong points of their business that have sparked their rapid growth.
[See how they do it→](https://duffel.com/</blog/ulysse-uses-duffel-to-put-customers-first>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/178494/136x32/ef302f46aa/bizaway.svg)
BizAway prioritises providing a better end-to-end experience for its customers, and Duffel’s suite of APIs cover the full flight experience: search, book, changes and cancellations, paid seats and bags, pay later options, and much more.
[See how they do it→](https://duffel.com/</blog/bizaway-partners-with-duffel>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Duffel**

**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** London, United Kingdom  
**Team Size:** 70 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator (Batch S18)  
**Website:** [duffel.com](https://duffel.com)

**Mission:**  
Duffel aims to simplify the travel selling process by providing a comprehensive toolkit that allows any business—be it a startup or a large enterprise—to easily engage in travel sales. This includes shopping for flights, accommodations, and other extras, as well as managing bookings seamlessly.

### What Does Duffel Do?

Duffel offers a robust API that enables businesses to integrate travel services into their platforms. Whether it’s for **travel startups**, **financial enterprises**, or **spend management solutions**, businesses can leverage Duffel to provide their customers with the following:

- **Flights:** Search and book flights, manage orders, handle loyalty programs, and add extras like seats and bags.
- **Accommodations:** Access over a million properties globally. Businesses can create custom hotel shopping experiences and earn commissions on bookings.
- **Links:** A customizable flight shopping experience that can be integrated right from the get-go.
  
### Key Features:

1. **User-Friendly API:** Comprehensive documentation, client libraries (Node.js, Python, Ruby), and built-in components facilitate easy integration and development.
2. **Diverse Offerings:** Support for various travel-related services, catering to different industries—from banks to spend management applications.
3. **Commission Opportunities:** Businesses can monetize through the sale of flights and accommodations.

### Customer Impact

Duffel is trusted by various teams and partners, showcasing its adaptability and effectiveness. **Companies like Pelikin, Ulysse, and BizAway** have successfully integrated Duffel’s technology to enhance their offerings, streamline operations, and boost revenue.

### Why Duffel?

In an industry where complexity often reigns, Duffel cuts through the noise. They focus on making travel sales straightforward and efficient, which is critical in today's fast-paced environment. If you're involved in travel or adjacent industries, Duffel could very well be your launchpad to simplifying operations and unlocking new revenue streams. 

So, if you're ready to sell travel without all the headaches, you might want to check them out. Sign up for free and start selling in less than a minute! If you want to delve deeper into their offerings, visit their website at [duffel.com](https://duffel.com).
